title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Most influencial leaders areNot Putin not anyone from eu.We take consideritaion also the heritage and DNA Nr 1 Are Biden trump Bush Clinton.Then then John Kerry.The other leaders are never gona be their level.Probably the Biden and trump are strongest country who have Trump and Biden as leaders then the this countries are lucky trump is like men also not snowflake.So the weakest Are definately canada trudeau and all UK leaders Also macron not strong likely Same like Putin and zelensky.Experts have. Not find Also from Australia the strong leader.Also the xpingÂ  not strong.Mostly who i say not strong means they got no special dna the accident pharonic bloodline wich makes strongest leaders.Also no any of those leaders from latin america right now we have just Biden and trump the Biden Are smart but trump Are strong.But RIGHT now probably the best leader are Biden in the world Even pope respect Biden.Probably Biden are the world leader not just the USA leader.Also the Putin cant do nothing until Biden Are alive second person who Putin listen Are trump but trump .Our world will not go in war until Biden and trump Lead world Also If Bushi and Clinton Are strong ones

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: If you're to go by mentioning of names then you may at long-run get it wrong because everyone has his good and bad side, we cannot assume leaders from US as the only ones that can be influential because US is one of the leading countries in the world or because of it popularity and vigor in world economy and commerce, any country or it's leaders who have the minds of the people at hand, who has good and positive conscience and ready to lead and not to rule is an influential leader to me because they have served the world with a good example.

comments.author: og kush420
comments.body: Quote from: 348Judah on December 29, 2022, 04:20:19 PMIf you're to go by mentioning of names then you may at long-run get it wrong because everyone has his good and bad side, we cannot assume leaders from US as the only ones that can be influential because US is one of the leading countries in the world or because of it popularity and vigor in world economy and commerce, any country or it's leaders who have the minds of the people at hand, who has good and positive conscience and ready to lead and not to rule is an influential leader to me because they have served the world with a good example.did you know when USA was leaving Afghanistan - the whole world was talking about There are many influential leaders in the world apart from Bush and Biden
